title: Again Our Earthly Cares We Leave
author: Philip Doddridge

verses.text:
Again our earthly cares we leave
And to Thy house repair;
Again with joyful souls we come
To seek our treasure there.

Within these walls may peace abound,
May all our worship prove
Acceptable to Thee, our God,
And built on holy love.

May we receive some fresh supply
Out of His boundless store,
And may we carry from this place
More goodness than before.

Thy blessing, Lord, we humbly seek
On all assembled here;
O make Thy face upon us shine,
And fill our hearts with cheer.
